parse.title: List of cricketers who were killed during military service

text.*:
This is a list of cricketers who were killed during military service. The cricketers are listed by war and divided into those who appeared in Test cricket and those only played first-class cricket.

The conflicts featured on this list are, in chronological order, the Napoleonic Wars, First Boer War, Mahdist War, Second Boer War, World War I, Easter Rising, Irish War of Independence, World War II and the South African Border War.

Contents

  • 1 Napoleonic Wars (1803-1815)
    • 1.1 First-class cricketers
  • 2 First Boer War (1880-1881)
    • 2.1 First-class cricketers
  • 3 Mahdist War (1881-1899)
    • 3.1 First-class cricketers
  • 4 Second Boer War (1899-1902)
    • 4.1 Test cricketers
    • 4.2 First-class cricketers
  • 5 World War I (1914-1918)
    • 5.1 Test cricketers
    • 5.2 First-class cricketers
  • 6 Easter Rising (1916)
    • 6.1 First-class cricketers
  • 7 Irish War of Independence (1919-1921)
    • 7.1 First-class cricketers
  • 8 World War II (1939-1945)
    • 8.1 Test cricketers
    • 8.2 First-class cricketers
  • 9 South African Border War (1966-1989)
    • 9.1 First-class cricketers
  • 10 See also
  • 11 References

Name Main first-class team Ref Date of death Place of death Ref
